Package org.group7.model.board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
org.group7.model.board.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMoveHandler, PieceExtractor, IBasePowerUpHandler, ILaserPowerUpHandler, ILightningPowerUpHandler
public class Board extends Object implements IMoveHandler, PieceExtractor, IBasePowerUpHandler, ILightningPowerUpHandler, ILaserPowerUpHandler
The Board class represents the game board.

    • removeEntitiesFromField

      public void removeEntitiesFromField(int pos, int amountTiles)
      The function removes all entities from a field starting from a given position and iterates through the field in a circular manner for 8 tiles.
      Specified by:
      removeEntitiesFromField in interface ILaserPowerUpHandler
      Parameters:
      pos - The `pos` parameter represents the starting position from where entities will be removed.
      amountTiles - The`amountTiles` parameter represents the number of tiles to iterate through.

    • pieceFromBaseToField

      public void pieceFromBaseToField(Color c, int diceRoll)
      The function moves a piece from a specific base (based on the color) to the field using the dice roll.
      Specified by:
      pieceFromBaseToField in interface IBasePowerUpHandler
      Parameters:
      c - The color of the player's pieces (e.g., Color.RED or Color.BLUE).
      diceRoll - The diceRoll parameter represents the number rolled on a die. It is used to determine the destination field for the piece being moved from the base.
